overview:
A leading provider of global online research panels and online surveys.

Lightspeed Research is the market researcherâ€™s choice for digitally accessing and deriving insight from consumer opinions and behaviors whenever, wherever and in whatever segments needed. The industryâ€™s most thorough panelist pre-screening process and large global pool delivers business-ready results quickly and cost-effectively.

From proprietary online access panels to specialty panels, custom panels and innovative mobile surveys, Lightspeed Research offers the industryâ€™s highest-quality and most complete combination of qualitative and quantitative online research.

This is backed by an expert client operations team that provides a range of data collection services, from sample management and survey design to programming and reporting.

Part of Kantar, a division of WPP, Lightspeed Research serves clients and cultivates online panelists across the Americas, Europe and Asia Pacific.
